Description: Limestone model of an anthropoid coffin with a lappet-wig, a modelled face and a collar; bands of Hieroglyphic text representing bandaging.
Curator's comments: This model coffin belongs to the scribe Pamerihu and its provenance is presumably Saqqara; other objects from this owner include: EA 5513 and EA 8703. See M.L. Bierbrier, 'Pamerihu Finds a Home', GM 179 (2000), 7-8 [number misquoted as 35209].
